Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: Hmm, this is a detailed question about comparing two event logs to identify bias. The user wants a clear analysis of systematic differences between Group A (Protected Group) and Group B (Unprotected Group).

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: I notice Group B gets a +10 (Community Boost) score adjustment when they have a CommunityGroup, which Group A never has. This seems like the core bias. The protected group lacks access to this boost entirely, even though some members might qualify.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - NE
Text: The approval rates confirm the impact: Group B approves 67% of applications with community boosts versus Group A 50%. The adjustment column clearly shows the disparity in how the same scoring system is applied differently based on community group membership.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: I should structure the response to first highlight the key difference, then break down how each attribute contributes, and conclude with the statistical implications. The tone should remain factual but emphasize the systematic nature of the exclusion.
